distribution_statements.executive_only: Distribution limited to Executive Branch personnel only
distribution_statements.authorized_only: Distribution limited to authorized personnel only
distribution_statements.agency_only: For internal agency use only - Do not disseminate outside agency
distribution_statements.contractor_restricted: Distribution limited to government personnel and authorized contractors

confidentiality_notices.standard: This document contains Controlled Unclassified Information (CUI) that requires safeguarding or dissemination controls pursuant to applicable laws, regulations, and Government-wide policies.
confidentiality_notices.budget: The nature and amounts of the President's decisions and underlying materials are confidential. Do not release outside of your agency until Budget is transmitted to Congress.
confidentiality_notices.law_enforcement: This document contains Law Enforcement Sensitive information. Unauthorized disclosure may compromise ongoing investigations or endanger law enforcement personnel.
confidentiality_notices.source_selection: This document contains Source Selection Information protected under FAR 2.101 and 41 USC 2102. Unauthorized disclosure is prohibited.
confidentiality_notices.tax: This document contains Federal Tax Information protected under 26 USC 6103. Unauthorized disclosure is a federal crime.
